name: Healthyfied Cucumber Strawberry Yogurt Shake
description: Discover a refreshing and low-carb delight with our Healthyfied Cucumber Strawberry Yogurt Shake. Tailored to suit health-conscious individuals, this low-sodium recipe is a perfect blend of wholesome ingredients designed to refresh and rejuvenate. Dive into a world of tasty, healthified recipes with this easy-to-make shake that promises flavor without compromise.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the cucumber and strawberries under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the cucumber into smaller pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced cucumber, soy milk, Stevia In the Raw, strawberries, and Greek yogurt into a blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Blend on high speed for about 2 minutes or until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the shake into glasses and enjoy immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
